trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
The object that holds the information to deserialize.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
The current type is not a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.

If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> property.
A description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> was thrown.
Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file.
The exception thrown shows only the first error.
You can access <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> to see all the errors issued.

An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> object that contains errors that identify the reasons this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file that caused this configuration exception to be thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> to be thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The path to the configuration file from which the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file that the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> was reading when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The path of the configuration file the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object represented when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file that contains the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object being parsed when this configuration exception was thrown.
Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object was processing when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetLineNumber%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file that the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetObjectData%2A> method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.

During deserialization, the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is transmitted over the stream.
The object that holds the information to be serialized.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Gets the line number within the configuration file at which this configuration exception was thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Gets an extended description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
An extended description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
